Review Text: My expectations were much higher. I didn't like the food combinations. It was crude and there were some basic mistakes one shouldn't do. Like overcook a guinea fowl. If you're so uninspired as to serve guinea fowl, please learn how to cook ‚Ä¶

Name: Ace
Review Text: We tried the six course menu with wine arrangement. It is a wonderful journey of the taste palates with every dish and wine! The price is extremely reasonable. Certainly a place to spoil yourself without spending much.

Name: Ace
Review Text: Excellent choice for a special dinner. The service was amazing,  especially given that it's in Amsterdam. The food was interesting, creative and very tasty. The atmosphere is cosy, the interior is quirky. We loved Restaurant ACE.
